alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Brule; Charles Mix; Douglas; Gregory; Jerauld (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 19 at 2:10AM MDT until April 19 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Gregory, Jerauld, Brule, Aurora, Charles Mix and Douglas Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Yankton Sioux Tribal Nation. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 6 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Relative humidity values of 20 to 30 percent combined with the strong winds will lead to very high to extreme fire danger conditions. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Aurora; Brule; Charles Mix; Douglas; Gregory; Jerauld
